name: MiReDo
description:
MiReDo is a rhythm memory game with visual cues. A series of notes from the C scale are played on a set of eight pads on the screen. The player's task is to play the notes on the pads in the reverse order.

Levels get progressively harder as more and more notes are played in series for the player to remember and play backwards. For every level you win, your score increases by the number of notes you remembered for that level.
